pages.title: Paper Kite Butterfly
pages.text: It has a wingspan of 12 to 14 cm.$(br2)The paper kite is of Southeast Asian origin, but can also be found in Northern Australia and Southern Taiwan.

pages.title: Paper Kite Butterfly
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
